name: Chromapoint - Battle Royale
description:
To play,install the itch.io app on your computer.Then press the install button next to "Official PreAlpha v0.2 Release.zip",it will install and when you want to play,just press launch!Alternatively,without the itch app,you just download the zip file, extract it and run the "Chromapoint - Battle Royale.exe" File.

Version Pre-Alpha 0.2 - For more info,go to https://ethaneditsbusiness.wixsite.com/radon
